description: This file defines the public interface for weather and location data fetching in the WeatherDualUnitFrontend project. It includes preset city location data, functions to fetch weather by geographic coordinates using OpenWeatherMap's API, and a function to get the user's geolocation via the browser's navigator API.

methods.name: fetchWeatherByCoords(lat, lon, apiKey)
methods.description: Fetches current weather data for specified latitude and longitude using OpenWeatherMap API, returning temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit along with the city name.
methods.returns: Promise resolving to an object with tempC, tempF, and city

methods.name: getUserGeolocation()
methods.description: Retrieves the user's geographic location via the browser's Geolocation API, returning a Promise that resolves with latitude and longitude or rejects with an error.
